title: Waiting for stats...
body:
After finishing a game, 'waiting for stats' takes forever to load. Sometimes it doesn't even work. This also happens when I quit a custom game.

Any Solutions ?

replies.body:
Hey Joash,

Sorry, this is an issue on our end D:

We believe we've figured out what is causing this and are currently testing a few solutions. We'll get end of game stats working normally again as soon as we can!
